name: Pliny the Elder
description: An intense and hoppy brew with a citrus and pine aroma.

name: Heady Topper
description: A hazy and unfiltered beer with a juicy, tropical fruit flavor.

name: Bourbon County Brand Stout
description: A rich and boozy beer aged in bourbon barrels with notes of chocolate and vanilla.

name: Dark Lord
description: A complex and intense brew with flavors of roasted malt, coffee, and dark fruit.

name: Hopslam
description: A highly hopped beer with a sweet honey malt balance and a grapefruit finish.

name: KBS
description: A smooth and silky beer with flavors of coffee, chocolate, and bourbon.

name: Fou' Foune
description: A sour and fruity beer with a peach flavor and a dry finish.

name: Cantillon Gueuze
description: A complex and funky beer with a sour and tart taste and a champagne-like effervescence.

name: Westvleteren 12
description: A rich and fruity beer with a malty sweetness and a warming alcohol finish.

name: Trappist Rochefort 10
description: A deep and complex beer with notes of dark fruit, caramel, and chocolate.

name: Pliny the Younger
description: A massively hopped beer with a tropical fruit flavor and a piney bitterness.

name: Sculpin IPA
description: A hoppy and citrusy beer with a crisp and clean finish.

name: Weihenstephaner Hefeweissbier
description: A light and refreshing beer with flavors of banana and clove and a creamy mouthfeel.

name: Orval
description: A complex and spicy beer with a dry finish and a Brettanomyces funkiness.

name: La Fin Du Monde
description: A smooth and balanced beer with flavors of fruit, spice, and a hint of sweetness.

name: Duvel
description: A golden and effervescent beer with a dry and bitter finish.

name: Emelisse Triple IPA
description: A bold and bitter beer with a fruity hop aroma and a high alcohol content.

name: Brouwerij 't IJ IPA
description: A hoppy and refreshing beer with a citrusy and piney aroma and a crisp finish.

name: De Molen Rasputin
description: A complex and flavorful beer with notes of chocolate, coffee, and dark fruit.

name: Jopen Mooie Nel IPA
description: A well-balanced and smooth IPA with a tropical fruit aroma and a bitter finish.

name: Gebrouwen door Vrouwen Gluiperd
description: A hoppy and full-bodied beer with a floral and fruity aroma and a lingering bitterness.

name: Kaapse Brouwers Karel
description: A rich and full-bodied beer with a roasted malt character and a smooth finish.

name: Baxbier Kon Minder
description: A light and refreshing beer with a fruity hop aroma and a low alcohol content.

name: Oedipus Mannenliefde
description: A spicy and fruity beer with a dry and refreshing finish.

name: Bierbrouwerij De Koningshoeven Quadrupel
description: A rich and complex beer with a malty sweetness and a warming alcohol finish.

name: Dutch Bargain Imperial Stout
description: A smooth and velvety beer with notes of chocolate, coffee, and caramel.
